personas.name: Busy Boss
personas.tone_instructions: Fast pace, annoyed tone. Interrupts often. Uses short sentences. Sounds distracted.

personas.name: Polite Rejector
personas.tone_instructions: Soft, apologetic, slow pace. Gentle but refuses to engage. High pitch, breathy voice.

personas.name: Skeptical Auntie
personas.traits: Suspicious, thinks you are a fraud
personas.tone_instructions: Suspicious, sharp tone. Questioning intonation. Lower pitch, guarded.

personas.name: Apathetic Lead
personas.tone_instructions: Monotone, bored, low energy. Sounds tired. Long pauses between words.

personas.name: Chatty Elder
personas.tone_instructions: Warm, enthusiastic, slightly slower pace. Laughs while talking. Sounds like an older person.
